data.lyric:
[ti:Burning Man]
[ar:Dierks Bentley/Brothers Osborne]
[al:The Mountain]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Burning Man - Dierks Bentley/Brothers Osborne
[00:17.04]Half your life you struggle
[00:19.44]
[00:20.92]Half your life you fly
[00:23.25]
[00:25.06]Half your life makin' trouble
[00:27.42]
[00:28.30]Half your life makin' it right
[00:31.38]
[00:33.09]One day I'm the exception
[00:35.67]
[00:37.12]Most days I'm just like most
[00:39.60]
[00:40.98]Some days I'm headed in the right direction
[00:44.59]
[00:45.11]And some days I ain't even close
[00:47.72]
[00:50.03]I'm a little bit steady but still little bit rollin' stone
[00:54.05]I'm a little bit heaven
[00:55.62]But still a little bit flesh and bone
[00:58.01]Little found little don't know where I am
[01:01.13]I'm a little bit holy water
[01:03.18]But still a little bit burning man
[01:06.94]
[01:08.26]Burning man
[01:12.36]Yeah I always loved the highway
[01:15.91]
[01:17.45]I just don't run it as fast
[01:20.16]
[01:21.35]I still go wherever the wind blows me
[01:25.19]But I always find my way back
[01:27.74]
[01:29.42]I still don't get it right sometimes
[01:32.80]
[01:33.44]I just don't get it as wrong
[01:36.38]
[01:37.39]I still go a little bit crazy sometimes
[01:41.00]Yeah but now I don't stay near as long
[01:44.43]
[01:46.58]I'm a little bit steady but still little bit rollin' stone
[01:50.54]I'm a little bit heaven
[01:52.16]But still a little bit flesh and bone
[01:54.60]Little found little don't know where I am
[01:57.64]I'm a little bit holy
[01:58.84]Water but still a little bit burning man
[02:03.36]
[02:04.67]Burning man
[02:08.12]
[02:09.09]Still just a burn burn burning man
[02:13.40]Just burning man
[02:15.51]Man
[02:16.27]
[02:34.20]Maybe I'll go to the desert
[02:36.44]
[02:37.57]Find myself in the Joshua Tree
[02:40.60]
[02:41.49]If we pass in the night then
[02:43.90]Just hand me a light
[02:45.52]And tell me you burned just like me
[02:48.99]
[02:51.06]I'm a little bit steady but still little bit rollin' stone
[02:55.07]I'm a little bit heaven
[02:56.62]But still a little bit flesh and bone
[02:59.07]Little found little don't know where I am
[03:02.13]I'm a little bit holy water
[03:04.07]But still a little bit burning man
[03:08.03]
[03:09.22]Burning man
[03:12.73]
[03:13.63]Still just a burn burn burning man
[03:18.03]Just a burning man
[03:20.27]
[03:52.17]Burning man
